You can change the system date in the file ... but it won't work on anyone else's computer. SAS uses a very sophisticated algorithm (so guys like you - no offense!) can't reasonably use it. After mucking with the dates, the file is now useless.

Your version still works because SAS only uses the license file once -  upon validation - then remembers the expiration dates. So it makes sense that it still works for you!
